name: Kingdom Claw: Invaders
description:
Please fill out this feedback form!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSenfaQg-w4p6qvDxaKHfWsJvYKHC84bz36eWc2m...

Defend your animal young against the invading extraterrestrial demons using the military might of the:

CUTtlefish - a medium range, medium attack speed, low damage knife flinger

Pole-r Bear: A short range, heavy hitting, fast attacking invader-whacker

CATapult: It launches cats.  Cats attack everything in sight. (Slow attack speed, AOE, long range)

Do you have what it takes to defend your home against the nefarious "Invaders?"  

Click a unit in the shop, click a node to place it.  Once it is placed, click it again to upgrade or sell it.

Mouse wheel to zoom.

Now in BETA/RELEASE!

Audio may be added, but is not in the scope of my project.
